casebody.data:
Haywood A. CANNON
v.
WIGGINS, Adm. No. 527P00-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of July 2006 by Plaintiff in the Cause:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."

Justices WAINWRIGHT and MARTIN recused.
